name: Corrosive Skin
desc: Viper exudes an infectious toxin that damages and slows the attack speed of any enemy that damages it in a 1400 radius. The acid exudate also increases Viper's resistance to magic.

name: Feast
desc: Lifestealer's attacks damage enemies and heal himself for a percentage of his target's current health.

name: Searing Chains
desc: Ember Spirit unleashes fiery bolas that wrap around nearby enemies, anchoring them in place and dealing damage each second.

name: Take Aim
desc: Extends the attack range of Sniper's rifle.

name: Strafe
desc: Clinkz nimbly attacks with a barrage of arrows. Dramatically increases attack speed for a short time and grants Clinkz the ability to automatically dodge projectiles.

name: Reactive Armor
desc: Each time Timbersaw is attacked, he gains increased health regen and armor.

name: Scorched Earth
desc: Carpets the nearby earth in flames which damage enemies and heal Doom, while also granting him increased movement speed.

name: Kraken Shell
desc:
Thickens Tidehunter's hide to passively block a portion of any incoming physical attack damage. The hide also removes negative status effects if the damage taken crosses a threshold.

Does not stack with items that provide Damage Block.

DISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel

name: Flux
desc: Infuses a lone enemy unit with swirling, volatile energy, slowing its movement speed and dealing damage over time. The effect is muted if another enemy unit is near the target.

name: Fate's Edict
desc: Oracle enraptures a target, disarming them and granting them 100% magic damage resistance. Can be cast on allies and enemies.
